item.title: TF2 War update
item.dc:creator: Skilgannon
item.description:
So apparently, according to the blog, they’re beta-ing bots now. Which is cool. Wait…

SERIOUSLY VALVE? You’re only just now thinking: O hey giez, wut abt botz?
You didn’t think that there might be some people out there who might want to practice off-line against something that fights back? Goddamn you.[/rant]

Also, I’m in two minds about bots, as I know a server in BF2 that’s all bots, is used by the clan that runs it, and very rarely gets many players. Gimme Uberium and Fragmasters TF2 any day. Fun fun fun!

Read full topic

item.title: TF2 War update
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
Donofdeath:

I have all of the weapons, I just don’t have the Rocket Jumping Boots.

I have 2 pairs already.

I don’t know how I feel about them. Not being able to pull out a shotgun is a big deal in a firefight, but I find myself rocket jumping a lot more. I didn’t like to rocket jump previously because of how much damage I took, but now that I can just jump out of any situation, it’s pretty nice.

Also, I love using the direct hit on pyros, they’re so used to the slow rockets a lot of them can’t airblast in time to reflect the rocket.

Read full topic

item.title: TF2 War update
item.dc:creator: func_random
item.description:
Playing Pyro against the many waves of targe/Eyelander demos is quite pointless, taking into account the fact that the Eyelander has the same range as the flamethrower, and the Targe is mostly resistant to fire anyways.

item.title: TF2 War update
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
Brother Shrike:

Is it strange that the first demo & soldier achievements that I got were the rocket jumping ones?

My first soldier achievement was “the kill another enemy while you are both in the air” (name?) one, so that is technically related. Oddly I got it while I was on the ground.

EDIT: How do you kill a maxed out demo with the shield in only two hits? It takes at least 5.

EDIT 2: 6 if they are all direct hits from the Direct Hit. In other words, get that freakin’ thing balanced, Valve.

Read full topic

item.title: TF2 War update
item.dc:creator: bigfan421
item.description:
Cameron :smiley: :

The Steam servers were buggy yesterday. I have all the milestones, yet I still don’t have my Scottish Resistance.

On the other hand, I have 2 refined metal and 1 reclaimed metal … Then again, at the rate I unlock weapons, it will be another 6 months before I have enough to get my 3rd refined metal and therefore my 3rd hat.

I was on my other groups server and every time I died (I seem to do that a lot)
I would get a shit-ton of unlockable items, It even gave me the eyelander and I yet to even earn it.

Read full topic
